about_the_game:
A DARK WORLD

In a distant past, beings of darkness threatened humanity. To stop them, the last powerful men created the 'Umbra Sicarius' clan and, with deep magic, raised towers to imprison these creatures. But in the Red Tower, a malevolent force of immense power has awakened, and the Guardian of the Red Tower must take action.

BECOME A GUNSLINGER WITCHER

Red Tower is a top-down shooter game with 8-direction aiming, combining roguelite, bullet hell, and dungeon crawler elements. You take on the role of a gun-wielding wizard, Guardian of the Tower, armed with a magic wand and a firearm. Your mission is to climb the tower, destroying demons and purifying the Stones of Power to save the tower from corruption. In case of death, you won’t start from the beginning but from the first floor of each respective block. The gold and upgrades you’ve earned remain with you, helping you face even greater challenges.

BE BLESSED

Use combinations of magic and firearms to purge everything in your path. Upgrade your arsenal of weapons, blessing cards, bombs, and spells. Talk to the merchant—he can improve them for a small price, of course... haha.

INSANE CHALLENGES!

New surprises await you in the NewPlus mode, where you will keep all your progress, upgrades, and magic acquired, with a difficulty that only true guardians can handle. During this new journey, you can unlock new cards and upgrades for your character. If you enjoy a frenetic challenge with insane difficulty, this mode is for you.
